Conversations/flavor_text/bathhouse_bedr: The bubbling cauldron fills the room with the scent of lychee and rose.
You gently place a finger on the crystal ball...
"Recent discoveries in western Aldaria suggest a line of ancient queens may have ruled the area prior to the Dark Ages."
An ornate book lays open on Juniper's desk...
Jars full of colorful concoctions fill the shelf.
Conversations/flavor_text/bathhouse_caul: The cauldron is full of a mysterious, brightly colored liquid.
Conversations/flavor_text/bathhouse_chan: Cubbies for bathers to store their clothing in.
This doorway leads to the bath, but you need to pay at the front desk before you can go in.
The fountain gives the changing room a feeling of serenity.
Conversations/flavor_text/bathhouse_lock: Neatly stacked clean towels and slippers fill the shelves.
Conversations/flavor_text/bathhouse_shel: Handmade soaps and jars line the shelves.
You're not sure what the crystal has to do with bathing.
Bath salts, bath oils, and a very big crystal.
Interestingly, they don't seem to be bath products.
Many of these jars and boxes are unlabeled.
Conversations/flavor_text/blacksmiths_di: Display tools are lined up for sale.
Conversations/flavor_text/blacksmiths_ma: An impressive collection of trophies and awards fill March's shelves.
It smells nice, like cedarwood and sage.
Conversations/flavor_text/blacksmiths_ol: This must be Olric's collection of interesting crystals and minerals.
A shelf lined with small geological treasures.
A variety of strange looking rocks decorate this shelf.
Conversations/flavor_text/blacksmiths_wo: This work bench is scrupulously organized.
Conversations/flavor_text/carpenters_bir: A collection of cute bird houses handmade by Ryis.
Conversations/flavor_text/carpenters_f2_: A variety of carpentry books and birdwatching guides fill the shelves.
It looks like Landen is in the middle of writing a letter to an old friend.
Ryis seems to be working on a blueprint for something.
An expertly crafted clothing trunk. It smells like fresh pine!
Conversations/flavor_text/carpenters_too: An impressive array of carpenter's tools are displayed on the walls.
Conversations/flavor_text/carpenters_wor: The pleasant smell of wood chips fills the air.
Conversations/flavor_text/celine_desk/1: A note pasted to the side reads "you can do it!" with a poorly drawn smiley face underneath.
Conversations/flavor_text/celine_desk/in: A planter full of newly sprouted shoots.
Conversations/flavor_text/celine_end_tab: A forgotten cup of tea, recently gone cold.
Conversations/flavor_text/celine_firepla: "The $Codex Mistria$ that Errol loaned to me appears to be an ancient record of local flora... Amazing!"
A journal full of handwritten notes sits half open on the mantel.
Conversations/flavor_text/celine_plant_s: Celine's plant shelf fills the cottage with a fresh botanical scent.
Conversations/flavor_text/clinic_f1_desk: This must be where Valen mixes up her syrups.
Conversations/flavor_text/clinic_f1_skel: Up close, it's clear that this isn't a real skeleton.
Conversations/flavor_text/clinic_f1_trap: A trapdoor to the basement. It's locked.
Conversations/flavor_text/clinic_f2_book: The book shelf is filled with medical journals and mystery novels.
Conversations/flavor_text/clinic_f2_cact: It fills the room with the bright scent of cactus blossom.
A cute cactus with a single flower.
Conversations/flavor_text/eastern_road_s: The stairs to the Deep Woods are covered in giant, impassable vines.
The stairs to the Deep Woods are covered in giant, impassable vines.
The stairs to the Deep Woods are covered in giant, impassable vines.
The stairs to the Deep Woods are covered in giant, impassable vines.
Conversations/flavor_text/errol_bookshel: "The Caldosian Empire to the east of Aldaria is known to share cultural and religious customs with early Alda society."
"Evidence suggests that both originate from a single pre-Alda civilization, though little is known about them."
A thick tome sits bookmarked on Errol's shelf...
Conversations/flavor_text/errol_desk/ini: Errol seems to have taken his museum curator work home with him.
Conversations/flavor_text/errol_toolbox/: A box full of worn out mining tools.
Conversations/flavor_text/general_home_b: Entrepreneurship books, wood carving books, and comic books all compete for shelf space.
Conversations/flavor_text/general_home_d: The walls inside are decorated with faded floral wallpaper and a freshly carved miniature wooden sword.
A well-loved dollhouse crafted by Holt.
Conversations/flavor_text/general_home_w: Holt's workbench, filled with in-progress carved wooden figures.
Conversations/flavor_text/general_store_: A cozy looking blanket fort, guarded by a dog plushie.
Wall shelves displaying an impressive collection of cool rocks and sticks.
A toy chest filled with well loved toys and what can only be described as detritus.
A collection of Holt's hand carved wooden figures. They're very cute!
A peek into this book reveals that it's Holt's punning journal.
Nora's General Store ledgers are neatly arranged on the shelves.
The display is overflowing with fresh produce!
The produce section is well-stocked and neatly organized.
The shelves are a little bit bare.
The shelves are looking nice and full!
Various items are low in stock.
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_nights: A coffee cup sits on the nightstand...
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_shelf/: Henrietta's golden chicken prize sits proudly atop the shelf.
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_small_: Hayden's barn. This must be where his large animals live.
Hayden's coop. This must be where his small animals live.
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_statue: A beautifully carved wooden chicken. It looks very snug in its basket.
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_trunk/: A large clothing trunk. It smells like grain, warm and sweet.
Conversations/flavor_text/haydens_wall_a: Pictures of animals are prominently displayed on the wall.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_balor_crat: A well sealed crate. It smells faintly of oak and rum.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_balor_lock: A lockbox with an impressively complicated looking lock.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_balor_vani: A stack of hastily wiped dishes.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_banner/ini: An old woven tapestry featuring a sleeping dragon design.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_cabinet/1: An empty mason jar features a worn and peeling label which reads "BEES - DO NOT TOUCH".
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_cabinet/in: The cabinet is full of glassware and various bottles.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_flower_pot: Freshly cut flowers fill the vase. You wonder if Celine brought them in.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_hemlock_lu: Hemlock's prized lute seems very well cared for.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_hemlock_va: Hair care products sit on top of Hemlock's bureau.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_jo_vanity/: Cosmetics and accessories sit on top of Josephine's bureau.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_luc_net/in: Luc's bug net. You're probably not powerful enough to wield it.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_luc_terrar: A small terrarium sits on top of the bureau. There are a variety of cute bugs living inside!
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_maple_artw: A drawing of Prince Rabbit, rendered in colored pencil.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_maple_bear: Marchioness Bear sits plotting next to Maple's toy chest.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_maple_plus: Prince Rabbit and Duke Frog oversee Queen Maple's room.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_reina_book: Reina's recipe book. It's full of handwritten recipes!
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_reina_shel: The bookshelf is full of cookbooks and adventure novels.
Conversations/flavor_text/inn_reina_stov: Reina's test kitchen. The fresh smell of citrus lingers in the air.
Conversations/flavor_text/lighthouse_doo: The door appears to be locked.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_adeline_: Non-fiction and romance books fight for space on the shelves.
These plants were likely given to Adeline by Celine. It seems like she's doing her best to take care of them.
Adeline's eyeshadow palette has pride of place on her vanity.
The wardrobe has a fresh linen scent. It's sure to be full of beautiful clothing.
An impressive chart relating to Mistria's restoration plan.
This entire bookshelf seems to be dedicated to carbon copies of every form that Adeline has ever filled out.
A shelf full of books about town government.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_adline_b: A bookshelf packed with town census data going back decades.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_dining_d: The door doesn't seem to open.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_dining_p: A family portrait depicting young Adeline and Eiland with their parents, the Baron and Baroness.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_eiland_b: A dog-eared pile of history books. Eiland must reference them often.
History books and board games clutter the shelves.
It's full of sweet-smelling strawberry candy.
A replica Alda pot sits on the top shelf...
A small collection of artifacts sits atop this bookshelf. You suspect Eiland found them all himself.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_eiland_o: A shelf of artifacts that Eiland has carefully reconstructed.
A small plaque indicates that this is a faithful recreation of the famous statue known as "the chubby pony".  It must be a favorite of Eiland's.
"Bringing the Dark Ages to a close, the fractured Alda tribes united to found the Kingdom of Aldaria."
A stately book sits prominently on the shelf...
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_elsie_be: A bookshelf bursting with romantic novels of every kind. They're very well worn.
Scripts from famous plays and operas, all of which prominently feature a character played by Elsie.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_lectern/: There's also a survey section asking visitors to rate their experience.
Adeline's meeting schedule sits on the lectern outside her office along with a sign-in sheet...
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_pottery/: A fine example of early Aldarian pottery. It's a shame it's chipped.
Conversations/flavor_text/manor_stele/in: An ancient stele depicting a set of legendary armor.
Conversations/flavor_text/mines_blocked_: Rubble fills the doorway, blocking it completely.
Conversations/flavor_text/mines_door_boa: The entrance to the mines appears to be boarded up.
Conversations/flavor_text/narrows_broken: The stairs look too dangerous to climb in this state. They were probably destroyed in the earthquake.
Conversations/flavor_text/narrows_cave/i: Rubble blocks what appears to be a cave entrance.
Conversations/flavor_text/narrows_grypho: An ancient stone gryphon. They seem to be a common feature in the Narrows.
An ancient stone gryphon. They seem to be a common feature in the Narrows.
An ancient stone gryphon. They seem to be a common feature in the Narrows.
Conversations/flavor_text/sand_castle/in: The side of the sand castle is engraved with the name "Fort Dangerous II".
Conversations/flavor_text/spring_flower_: A planter full of spring flowers. They smell nice!
Conversations/flavor_text/terithias_wall: A model of an impressively large fish.
Conversations/flavor_text/town_fountain/: The fountain adds a peaceful atmosphere to the upper town square.
Conversations/flavor_text/western_ruins_: The stairs look too dangerous to climb in this state. They were probably destroyed in the earthquake.
A variety of tools and pottery fragments are laid out on the tarp.
Archaeology equipment sits at the edge of the dig site.
